sense.gloss: great erudition, extensive knowledge, vast stock of knowledge
inner mysteries (of a field of study), secrets

r_ele.r: うんちくをかたむける

sense.gloss: to draw upon one's profound knowledge
mozuku (Cladosiphon okamuranus and Sphaerotrichia divaricata, types of edible seaweed)
the five skandhas (matter, sensation, perception, mental formations and consciousness), the five aggregates
bardo, state (or period) of intermediate existence between one's death and rebirth (in Japan, 49 days)
formation of volition, aggregate of volition

words.gloss: great erudition, extensive knowledge, vast stock of knowledge
inner mysteries (of a field of study), secrets
